name: NRKNewsinNorwegian
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The latest hourly news broadcast Dagsnytt, and all available regional news, in Norwegian from the radio channel NRK P1. Available as soon as the broadcast is converted to on demand.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
